sent.orig: Practically as interesting –and much more practical, if you're a marketer.
sent.trans: 几乎一样的有趣——但实用得多，假如你是营销人员的话。

sent.orig: Within a couple of weeks, the Germans stood practically at the gates of Alexandria.
sent.trans: 两三个星期以后，德军几乎兵临亚历山大城下。

sent.orig: And then it analyses the reasons of the presence of the chambers theoretically and practically.
sent.trans: 其次从理论和实践两方面对商会存在的原因作了分析。

sent.orig: Leading families intermarry; practically everyone in the top flight is thus related.
sent.trans: 显赫的家族之间相互通婚；因此上层社会的人差不多都是沾亲带故。

sent.orig: There are different understandings upon time limit of carrier's delay in delivery theoretically and practically.
sent.trans: 目前我国理论界和实务界对承运人迟延履行的期限有不同的理解。
